name: react-inline-css
description: Inline CSS in your React components, namespaced automatically.

scripts.start: eval 'webpack-dev-server --config webpack.client-watch.js >tmp/server.log 2>&1 & SERVER_PID=$!';     sleep 1;      open http://localhost:8080;       tail -f tmp/*.log;     kill $SERVER_PID;
scripts.watch: eval 'npm run watch-client >tmp/client.log 2>&1 & CLIENT_PID=$!';     sleep 3;    npm run start;     kill $CLIENT_PID;
